attributes.action: overturn the decision to impose a 15 points deduction on Leeds United F.C
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We feel that the 15 points deduction imposed on Leeds United F.C and is a travesty of justice. We wish for the Football Association to over turn this decision upon appeal.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
